result.name: Pinterest Glass Pane Theme/Skin
result.description:
The Pinterest Glass Pane Theme/Skin.
The theme includes a unique and stylish glass pane design that adds a touch of class to your Pinterest experience. The glass pane is translucent and provides a smooth and seamless scrolling experience.
 The theme also includes an innovative image transition feature that rotates your images 180 degrees scale Y axis at -1, color of text, color of icons, and other elements. This adds a unique and dynamic touch to your Pinterest experience, and is sure to set your boards apart from the rest.
The theme is easy to install and customize. Simply install the extension and you'll be able to start using the theme right away. You can customize the theme to suit your own personal style, and even add your own images and colors to make it truly your own
result.notes:
#7/26/2023

Version 1.0:>

Key features:

    1. A translucent glass pane design that adds a touch of class to your Pinterest experience
    2. An innovative image transition feature that rotates your images 180 degrees scale Y at -1
    3. Customizable background-image and colors to make the theme truly your own
    4. Colors of icons that match the overall theme of the skin.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

#: 08/11/2023
1. Image Shine Effect::Not fixed
